This 5 bedroom villa has just been completed and offers the ultimate in luxury living. On entering the double height front door, you are welcomed into the large open plan living and dining rooms flooded with natural light and with panoramic views of the sea and beach. Please call to arrange a private viewing.']

This modern type 4 villa comprises of exactly 9,868 sq.ft. The property includes ensuite accommodation for three full-time staff, a home office space, a service kitchen, a beautiful open plan show kitchen 10 bathrooms, 7 bedrooms, and a 3-car covered garage.
On the ground floor residents are greeted by the 4m high grand entrance gallery. On the west wing, you will find the guest bedroom, office room, guest powder room, and a large formal living/lounge area. Every space on the ground level opens to the garden. On the East wing, you have the open plan kitchen and dining area which leads into the garden outdoor dining area. Family living/dining, an open-plan show kitchen a functional service kitchen and double staff quarters with direct garage access. A large soaking tub and private terrace overlooking the Dubai Hills Golf course. Hole number 1.
This property has the most amazing, unique view of the Burj Khalifa and Downtown Skyline."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionThis 3BR+Maids comes fully furnished and equipped and is ready to run as a Holiday Home with high ROI, in one of the best destinations in the city to host tourists. 
Sustained demand for residences at City Walk will see the value of your investment grow as you or your guests enjoy a premier lifestyle destination brought to you by Meraas, a developer well-known for bringing creative living concepts to life.
Available exclusively through fam Properties, and managed by fam Holiday Homes to bring you a delightful offer on a serviced apartment in City Walk with a gorgeous layout and large living space. Located in Building 18B, which is incredibly close to the central Mall, yet removed enough from the busiest part of City Walk to offer privacy.
This is a great investment opportunity whether you decide to move in or use as a holiday home to generate a steady stream of income. 
* Generous, open-plan living spaces
* Floor-to-ceiling windows 
* Zanussi built-in kitchen appliances
* Wooden flooring
* Luxury fittings & fixtures
* En-suite bedrooms
* Built-in wardrobes
* Dedicated laundry
* Maids room
* 24/7 concierge services
* Pool & Gym
* Private parking
* Dining & retail
* Parks, play and BBQ areas
* DIRECT CITY WALK ACCESS
City Walk is the thriving mixed-use development found in the middle of the well-established Jumeirah neighborhood, directly accessible from SZR. Surrounded by the most popular and pleasant areas in Dubai. The project has garnered much excitement thanks to its excellent location and superb retail, dining, entertainment, hospitality and leisure offerings at City Walk.
We have a collection of the best apartments available in this incredible project. With just one call to a City Walk specialist, you can see them all.
